pages.page:
P REUNION 2018
P盼P回忆
P Assembly
29 SEPTEMBER 2018 – 30 SEPTEMBER 2018

AGENDA
Day 1
0930-1030- Registration (Ying Hui & Kelly)
1030 – 1100: G & D (Keng Wai)
1100 – 1110: MC Intro/Video (Lucas)
1110 – 1140: Introduction by batch (MC Conduct: Lucas)
1140 – 1210: Icebreaking 30 mins (kawo)
1210 – 1340: Check in and Lunch
1340 – 1350: Song [如果我们不曾相遇] (Hong Keat & MC)
1350 – 1415: Study Sharing (Xuan Fu & Qiao Tong)
1415 – 1545: Small group discussion (Yee Mun)
1545 - 1600 encouragment & closing study (jun bing)
1600 – 1740: Outdoor Games (Ching Whern & Jian Wei)
1740 – 1800: Tea Break
1800 – 1900: Bath & Rest
1900 – 2000: Dinner
2000 – 2030: G & D (Ching Whern)
2030 – 1030: Creative Night (Ching Whern & Jian Wei &
Keng Wai)
1030 – 1100: Supper

AGENDA
Day 2
0700 – 0800: Pack and breakfast
0800 – 0830: G&D (Jian Wei)
0830 – 0930: Experience & impression (Senior)
0930 – 0935: Song [P-Song](Hong Keat & MC)
0935 – 1005: P-History (Li Yan)
1005 – 1115: Dialog & Sharing & encouragement (senior)
1115 – 1125: Gather and Video (Rui Peng/ Swee Phang)
1125 – 1155: Photo session (Pei Yi)
1155 – 1225: Check out and lunch1230-
1430: Lunch (Outside)

SONG - 如果我们不曾相遇
如果我们不曾相遇 我会是在哪里？
如果我们从不曾相识 不存在这首歌曲
每秒都活着 每秒都死去
每秒都问著自己谁不曾找寻
谁不曾怀疑 茫茫人生奔向何地？
那一天 那一刻 那个场景
你出现在我生命从此后 从人生 重新定义
从我故事里苏醒如果我们不曾相遇
你又会在哪里？如果我们从不曾相识 人间又如何运行？
晒伤的脱皮 意外的雪景
与你相依的四季苍狗又白云
身旁有了你 匆匆轮回又有何惧？
那一天 那一刻 那个场景
你出现在我生命每一分 每一秒 每个表情 故事都充满惊奇
在 “偶然与巧合 舞动了蝶翼 谁的心头风起”
“前仆而后继 万千人追寻 荒漠唯一菩提”
“是擦身相遇 或擦肩而去 命运犹如险棋”
“无数时间线 无尽可能性 终于交织向你”
那一天 那一刻 那个场景
你出现在我生命未知的 未来里 未定机率
然而此刻拥有你某一天 某一刻 某次呼吸
我们终将再分离而我的 自传里 曾经有你
没有遗憾的诗句诗句里充满感激
如果我们不曾相遇 我会是在哪里？
如果我们从不曾相识 不存在这首歌曲

SONG – ACAD P SONG
We gave our best overcome our test
From north to south, and east to west
To be in the varsity, we call the green campus
To reveal the magnificent gem within each of us
We are one, we are happy, we are one big family.
With a sense of mission, never loss our vision
We are one, we are happy, we are Academy P
We are comrades of faith till the end of time
Hard as it seems, fulfilling our dreams
Study all our might, never give up to fight
Standing by the common people for eternity
Building a new century of humanity
We are one, we are happy, we are one big family.
With a sense of mission, never loss our vision
We are one, we are happy, we are Academy P X2
We are comrades of faith till the end of time
We must always ask ourselves,
Where knowledge gonna serve, knowledge isn’t
wisdom
Transform the knowledge to Wisdom
